title: Showdown in Seattle - NA Regionals Heading to PAX Prime

replies.body: Can we please get some East Coast stuff? :( Please?
Something in Boston maybe held by Riot would be nice!
Toronto, Canada. ;-; pls.
i agree somewhere in canada
or.... or... OR... midwest? Minnesota sounds nice and in the middle of everywhere.
Those feels. We have to buy a Passport and possibly a Visa, to go to an LCS or attempt to participate.
Yes, Canada things. Nowadays all the popular games don't get to come to canada. It is kinda sad
Yea LCS in the ACC or in the Skydome -_-
Pax East is held in Boston.
NA regionals to PAX East!
Except PAX East is in April.
Riot really blew the ball on not road tripping anywhere with the NALCS.
Atlanta would be smashing.
YES IT WOULD!!!
LoL is a Mid West thing too! would love to have something in Indy.
Indy? where is that India? :P
Indiana, silly. But yeah it'd be awesome if they had one in indy
Agreed. As a Florida resident, I want some NALCS action on the East Cost.

Seriously, for East Coasters, a live pro League of Legends match in person, we must traverse an epic expanse of either land or ocean. If LCS is too much for the road I'd honestly be happy with an IEM stop. Weekend LCS matches at PAX East during the next Spring split sounds like an amazing untapped opportunity.
PAX East is in Boston, PAX Prime in Seattle, can we PLEASE get some MIDWEST stuff... like CHICAGO?! Do you know how many of us are here just waiting with our wallets full of delicious cash.

TEXAS! please  riot? :c
Hey it would have been really cool if this was stated before Pax Prime badges were sold out.
This great and all, but how about something for those not living on the West Coast?!?!?
How about something towards the East? Not just the northeast either, what about Washington DC or Florida or even something in like Texas or Chicago... basically off of the west coast -.-
How about some love to the midwest?!
It must be un{{champion:106}}  for you east guys :c, but Washington doesn't get much attention other than pesky sparkling vampires
Pax already sold out :(
All the Pax Prime tickets sold out in less than 5 hours almost 2 months ago.
Wait, aren't they just announcing it? Were the tickets already previously offered?
Tickets went on sale and sold out back at the end of April.

That's even not accurate: if you weren't in the online queue 5 minutes after the announcement of tickets being available by Pax on Twitter, you wouldn't have been able to get an access to 4-day passes. I entered 8 minutes after it, only got Monday.

This issue is causing a lot of trouble around Pax PRIME, even more this year than last year. You could watch tickets being sold back by scalpers 2 hours after all tickets were sold out for like $500, which is too much for many video game fans.

There is actually a difference here, as Pax PRIME is not at the beginning meant to exist only for NA Regionals, but for video games in general. That's why many people are also getting surprised by all tickets being sold out.

I hope that next year Pax will have improved their management of the sales, because it's becoming very frustrating for a lot of people, some tickets having been bought by some who were trying to have 4-day passes for their friends and themselves, and at the end bought 12 tickets for 4 people.
TEXAS!!!!! PLEASE!
Check my post out! go texas!
